metadata.title: CVE-2016-7102 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ownCloud Desktop before 2.2.3 allows local users to execute arbitrary codeand possibly gain privileges via a Trojan library in a "special path" inthe C: drive.

criterions.comment: owncloud-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
